member.name: T:StarSimLib.Constants
member.summary: Holds common constants and helper functions.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.BodyCount
member.summary: The amount of bodies that are rendered by default.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.CentralBodyMass
member.summary: The mass of the central body, if it is included.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.FrameRate
member.summary: The frame rate limit for the simulation.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.G
member.summary: The gravitational constant (m^3 kg^-1 s^-2).

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.SecondsPerFrame
member.summary: The number of seconds that each frame represents.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.SofteningFactor
member.summary: Softens the force between s to avoid infinities.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.SofteningFactor2
member.summary: The square of the .

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.SolarMass
member.summary: The mass of the sun (1.98892e30f).

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.TimeStep
member.summary: The default time step for the simulation.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.UniverseScalingFactor
member.summary: Factor by which to multiply the position of s to scale them to the screen for displaying.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.UniverseSize
member.summary: The maximum radius within which s will be placed (1e18f).

member.summary: The connection string used to access the simulator database.

member.name: T:StarSimLib.Graphics.Drawer
member.summary: Represents a drawer capable of rendering bodies to a screen.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Graphics.Drawer.managedBodies
member.summary: Holds all the instances that should be simulated.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Graphics.Drawer.managedBodyShapeMap
member.summary: Maps a to the that represents it, and is drawn to the screen at the s position.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Graphics.Drawer.originOffset
member.summary: The offset that has to be applied to the positions of a , so that they appear to be in the centre of the render target and not the top left corner.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Graphics.Drawer.renderTarget
member.summary: The target to which the managed bodies will be drawn.

member.name: M:StarSimLib.Graphics.Drawer.#ctor(SFML.Graphics.RenderTarget,StarSimLib.Physics.Body[]@,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{StarSimLib.Physics.Body,SFML.Graphics.CircleShape}@)
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class.
member.param: The target to which the managed bodies should be rendered.
The instances which should be managed by this instance.
Maps a instance to the that represents it, and is drawn to the screen at the instances position.

member.name: M:StarSimLib.Graphics.Drawer.DrawBodies
member.summary: Draws each instance that is managed by this drawer to the specified in the constructor.

member.summary: The current force on the in 3D space.

member.summary: The mass of the .

member.summary: The current position of the in 3D space.

member.summary: The current velocity of the in 3D space.

member.name: M:StarSimLib.Physics.Body.GetForceBetween(StarSimLib.Physics.Body,StarSimLib.Physics.Body)
member.summary: Gets the force vector for the attraction between A and B.

member.name: M:StarSimLib.Physics.Body.AddForce(StarSimLib.Physics.Body)
member.summary: Calculates the force between this instance and the given other body, and adds the resultant vector to the internal total force vector.
member.param: The other body to calculate the force between.

member.name: M:StarSimLib.Physics.Body.Collide(StarSimLib.Physics.Body)
member.summary: Collides this instance with the given instance.
member.param: The other instance with which to collide.

member.name: M:StarSimLib.Physics.Body.DistanceTo(StarSimLib.Physics.Body,StarSimLib.Vector3d@)
member.summary: Finds and returns the distance between the current instance and the given . In other words, it finds the magnitude of the translation vector between the two instances.
member.param: The other instance to which to calculate the distance.
The vector showing the displacement of the current body from the given one.
member.returns: The distance to the other as a .

member.name: M:StarSimLib.Physics.Body.ResetForce
member.summary: Resets the internal force vector.

member.name: M:StarSimLib.Physics.Body.Update(System.Double)
member.summary: Updates the of the current body using the internal force vector and the given time step.

member.name: M:StarSimLib.Physics.Body.Update(StarSimLib.Vector3d,System.Double)
member.summary: Updates the of the current body using the given force vector and time step.
member.param: The sum vector of all forces due to other s.

member.name: T:StarSimLib.Physics.BodyGenerator
member.summary: Provides methods for generating instances.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Physics.BodyGenerator.Rng
member.summary: Caches a random number generator to use for all randomised positions and velocities.

member.name: P:StarSimLib.Physics.BodyGenerator.CurrentGeneration
member.summary: The current generation of instances that the generator is on.

member.name: M:StarSimLib.Physics.BodyGenerator.GenerateBodies(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates an array of instances, and generates instances for each generated body. Returns the generated array and dictionary as a tuple.
member.param: The number of instances to generate.
Whether to have a central massive attractor.
member.returns: The generated array, and to map.

member.name: T:StarSimLib.Physics.UpdateDelegate
member.summary: Updates the given collections individual bodies, using the given delta time.

member.name: T:StarSimLib.Physics.BodyUpdater
member.summary: Provides methods for updating instance positions.

member.name: M:StarSimLib.Physics.BodyUpdater.UpdateBodiesBruteForce(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{StarSimLib.Physics.Body},System.Double)
member.summary: Updates the positions of all the given s with O(n^2) time complexity, with the given time step.
member.param: The collection of s whose positions to update.

member.name: T:StarSimLib.Physics.OrbitGenerator
member.summary: Provides methods for initialising positions, velocities, and orbits for instances.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Physics.OrbitGenerator.Rng
member.summary: Random number generator.

member.name: M:StarSimLib.Physics.OrbitGenerator.RandomOrbit(StarSimLib.Vector3d)
member.summary: Returns a randomised orbit around a central, heavy mass.
member.param: The position vector for the body for which to generate the orbit.
member.returns: The magnitude of the velocity of the orbit.

member.name: M:StarSimLib.Physics.OrbitGenerator.RandomPosition
member.summary: Returns a random position within the universe sphere (see ).
